author: grobmeier
msg: added my name to ognl and compress

author: markt
msg: Don't call the onError() method of the endpoint if the WebSocket close message cannot be sent for abnormal closure as this is not unexpected.

author: markt
msg: Handle the client dropping the connection during the SSL handshake in the same way as it is handled at any other time.

author: markt
msg: Include socket reference in IOExceptions to make debugging easier

author: markt
msg: Add a debug message that enables the socket reference (used in most debuig messages) to be matched to the port number (used in tcpdump) to enable unusual behaviour in the debug logs to be easily matched to the corresponding network activity.
